title: Gary Zukav On How To Surrender
description: From a June 18, 2001 Oprah Winfrey Show: Gary helps guests learn to let go of their pasts so they can move forward into the future. He explains that surrender is simply accepting your life and Oprah shares how by letting go, we step into the lives we are meant to live.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
